website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line model in the booster car seat category – a solid choice if you need a car seat for a growing toddler or older child.
pros: Combines popular quality Britax safety features such as impact protection and energy absorbing materials with adjustable components for a growing child – harness, buckle and seat
cons: The shoulder strap is a bit hard to adjust, and the seat is large and bulky

customer_reviews.title: I have a Diono Rainier and love it but it's a bit narrower than this Britax
customer_reviews.text: I am a certified passenger safety technician and after my kid was rear facing for 4 years I decided to buy this Britax model. I have a Diono Rainier and love it but it's a bit narrower than this Britax. I love the click tight which makes easier and correct install. And I LOVE THE HIGH WEIGHT AND HEIGHT LIMIT up to 90 lbs in 5 point harness which means I could keep my child in 5 point until 8-9 years old of course depending on growth. Remember keep your children in a 5 point harness as long as possible! Don't graduate them early!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tighten harness
customer_reviews.text: I know other people have posted about this but I have a very hard time tightening the shoulder restraint. I'm not sure if it is because it is designed for such a wide range of child sizes but I wouldn't recommend for smaller children maybe once they get older. Have reinstalled several times confirming a correct installation. Also, I'm 6'1" 220 lbs so it's not a matter of strength it just doesn't cinch tight without extraordinary measures. Was disappointing, particularly because our other child seat is a Britax ClickTight Marathon which I really love and would highly recommend (5 stars on the Marathon).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler seat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this carseat!! Between the click tight system and the tether, this thing is going nowhere! It's like it's glued in place! The shoulder padding is adequate enough to support his head while napping and he says he loves his "car chair". Only cons, it's heavy (steel frame), can be a little difficult to tighten (when they are at the lighter end of the weight limits), and boy is it expensive. Overall, I would but it again and I truly believe it is a worthwhile investment in my child's safety.
customer_reviews.author: bs

customer_reviews.title: so easy. He loves this seat and says it is ...
customer_reviews.text: As a CPST (Child Passenger Safety Technician), this is the only seat I considered after my son grew out of his Britax Boulevard. The click tight is the most incredible thing, so easy. He loves this seat and says it is super comfortable. Britax is the only brand I would buy- and I have studied and tried MANY others. Britax safety and testing is super impressive. Every part of this seat has a function designed for protecting your child
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much that I ordered a 2nd one as ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved so much that I ordered a 2nd one as well!!! If I could do it all over again I would only buy Britax. I’ve waisted so much money on other car seats but these are legit!!!! This seat is nice because the base comes off for a booster. The safest car seat with ultimate protection and most secure and comfortable. I have an almost 2 year old and a 4 1/2 year old bought the second for my oldest. Worth the money to me if it means my babies are safe if the worst were to come!
customer_reviews.author: DanyB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. We upgraded from a Britax G3 and wanted another solid booster seat similar to our G3. This one is perfect. Looks good, 5 point harness, two cup holders make my daughter happy as well. Like it so much we bought a 2nd one for our other car. Feels solid and I suspect it will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susuwatari

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat for y’all kids!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! My son is 4 and is the height of many 7 year olds. This seat allows him to stay in a five point harness longer. The side impact cushions are really large so no one can sit in the middle of my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Britax car seats for several years now and are always very pleased with the quality and comfort of the materials, assembly, and design. This seat is excellent. My son rides and sleeps in it very comfortably. He loves the built-in cup holders. We will definitely continue to buy Britax for all of our car seat needs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey K.

customer_reviews.title: #1 safest carseat..we have peace of mind knowing our little one is safe.
customer_reviews.text: #1 safest carseat... My husband was in an accident, the man who tboned him hit him right where our sons empty carseat was. After seeing the carseat, we quickly realized had our son been in there he would not have been ok. So we did a ton of research and narrowed our choice to this seat. It is very sturdy, we love the safety features, and we have peace of mind knowing our little one is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat! This car seat gives allow for a peace of mind that your child is secure and safe! I’ve been in a major accident with my daughter in this car seat and because of this car seat she was safe and had no visible bruise due to the protect this car seat offers. After that accident I bought three more for every car my daughter is on the road in, the price may be on the high end but my daughter life is priceless and to have security and affirmations of what this product can offers that price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Simple instructions, fantastic stability, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I just upgraded from our Britax Marathon to this one and I love it just as much. Every other seat I've ever dealt with had issues with the strap adjustment and the seats were never 100% secure. They all still wiggled. I love this seat because it absolutely does not move once installed. The manual is definitely needed for installation as nothing is intuitive, but it's extremely easy to follow and only a few simple steps. The click tight feature is awesome. The seat itself is very well made and comfortable for my growing toddler. It's also one of the only booster seats I've found with side impact protection. I'm a big fan. We'll be staying in the Britax family.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built, heavy car seat. The added protection on the side gives me some comfort in knowing that my son is a little safer. The only issue I’ve been having is that the clicktight system does not engage all the time when installing the car seat . You have to manually adjust the locking mechanism by pressing it in and out several times before it latches. It is a minor gripe, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Akira Zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of seats before going with this one. I didn't find one that was perfect, but this was the closest I found. Easy install. 5 point harness can be used nearly until a seat isn't required. Only issues are not the most comfortable and seat back extends high resulting in reduced visibility out the rear window. However, I've not doubt it will keep my kid safe, which is the priority.
customer_reviews.author: swilbert80

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, lacks in functionality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this carseat a year ago to replace our old Britax. The old one stopped snapping shut, and this one also now has stopped snapping shut, leaving the carseat useless. It's not a problem if you never move your carseat. We've moved the seat no more than 10 times in the last year, and would expect it to hold up more than 10 installations. It is also extremely difficult to tighten the straps. Super dissatisfied and disappointed in our last 2 Britax seats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: Get this thing, it has Race Car tech with crumple zones and it's a breeze to install. If you have leather seats you will need a pad to protect your seats...lots to choose from out there. It also looks really cool and is very roomy. My kid actually looks relaxed in it unlike the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Our four year old son needed a car seat that was rated for a higher weight and this car seat was one of the few that we found. It has exceeded our expectations. It was very easy to install into the car, feels sturdy and he fits in it great!
customer_reviews.author: Kucoy71

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat we ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat we ever owned. And I’ve gone through several to get to this one... the right one!!! My son was 40 lbs at 2 and I had such trouble with other seats. Diono especially hurt his back, and recaro (which I used to love) shortened their center buckle and does not accommodate a big kid. This britax seat is everything I could ask for and more. Super easy to tighten so the seat is secure, very safe seat... it’s just big but if you have the room it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great britax quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Comfy for kids. Great that has 2 cupholders. Recline, install and harness adjust not as clear and visible as with other click tight Britax models. Had to keep going online to find instructions, nevertheless there are more than enough videos on YouTube an they are super easy to find. Once you see it done it is super easy to do it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Best 5 Point Harness Booster Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I researched the heck out of this seat before purchasing. Excellent booster with 5 point harness for safety-conscious families. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Comfortable for my 4 year old granddaughter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Doo Dah Dae

customer_reviews.title: Liked this so much we bought two.
customer_reviews.text: We liked this one so much we bought two of them. Our children enjoy the extra space this seat provides along with the cup holder. The transition from the 5 point harness to the belt will be extremely easy to do. Took me only minutes to swap out the two car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great booster!
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing is that it needs to be on side not middle because of height. Otherwise, it gives me the assurance I need that my little one is safe. Super easy to install and I’m told it’s comfortable to boot.
customer_reviews.author: BB61911811

customer_reviews.title: Expensive yet plastic
customer_reviews.text: not at all what you would expect for $300. The material and the stitching is very very cheap. Its also plastic not steel frame. My first time trying this brand and just expected more. If I would have seen it before purchasing I would have looked at others.
customer_reviews.author: customer88

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is everything! I love the click tight feature. We have the click tight convertible car seat and loved it. So when I was looking for a booster and seen it had the click tight feature I was all for it! After you install this seat it does not MOVE. It is locked into place. Can’t say enough about this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Quinn

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: Since so many car seats have safety issues based on installation errors, we bought these. They're super easy to install, comfortable, and have great safety ratings!
customer_reviews.author: VitaminJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - user friendly - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat. The instructions were pretty straight forward and made anchoring fairly easy. The sliding back piece was an interesting way to hold the straps. Glad we purchased it and it looks like it is high enough quality to last years and grow with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: H Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have peace of mind knowing that my child is safe in this seat. She grows fast so not having to take the seat apart to move the straps up is a huge relief also. Easy to install as well. It is a heavier and bulkier seat so if you need to put another seat next to it this may be difficult. This is worth every penny I paid for it. You can't put a price on the safety of your child.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: How much is your child’s life worth ??
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves his new car seat he has been in Britax car seats from birth. Great price you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love our Britax
customer_reviews.text: Love the safety features. Easy to install! Car seat is heavy and has great head support. We have always loved Britax and this car seat has everything we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Yaribey D.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is very good quality and safety and comfortable. When I drive , my son likes to sleep on the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Made well, and easy to install. The extra padding around the head provides extra protection. I will only buy britax car seats. We were rear ended on Thanksgiving and my child wasn’t even aware that we were involved in an accident. Our old britax held up to the impact and absorbed all the impact. We bought this as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA

customer_reviews.title: Love my Britax car seats!
customer_reviews.text: I love all my britax carseats customer service is great and helpful. Only downside to this it doesn't actually click when it tightens like my other one, but could just be this seat and not others?
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered this a long time ago. So easy to install and buckle my children. I have a diono in our other car and i dread using the diono. I’m considering ordering another set to replace the diono.
customer_reviews.author: Clow

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Comfy for my twins. Bought them when I had to replace old convertible seats after an accident. I wish I would have bought them the first time
customer_reviews.author: Aleisha

customer_reviews.title: 3layer protection
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. My older daughter has this car seat. And I bought another one for my younger daughter. Love this 3 layer protection.
customer_reviews.author: Xian Li

customer_reviews.title: ) She had the back facing seat and this one is just as sturdy w/ excellent quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my visiting 2 yr old granddaughter. My husband was able to properly install (verified by fire Dept.) She had the back facing seat and this one is just as sturdy w/ excellent quality construction. Have two more grands who will be ready in another year or two. Will repurchase another when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, love the padding and the shock absorbers on ...
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this carseat. Tightens when its supposed to, comfortable, love the padding and the shock absorbers on shoulders. Fits great in my honda civic, my 4 yr old take naps in this carseat now.. Easy to loosen, easy to tighten.. Just one thing. Heavy carseat. Otherwise? No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Lovenreader5

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but very easy to install and well-built.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is very heavy and not the easiest to move from vehicle to vehicle, but you know your child is safe in this tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat!!! Very sturdy and my 5 year old said it is very comfortable! It was very simple to instal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's a little more than some but you get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. A little heavy but we took it to Hawaii and didn't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this car seat! It's SO SO SO easy to install it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Hackl

customer_reviews.title: but amazingly sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: On the pricey side, but amazingly sturdy... i feel the apple of my eye is safer and that is priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: Samy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect, its secure, its comfortable, it has two cup holder that my child loves.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great 5 point seat
customer_reviews.text: Great 5 point seat. Easy to install. A bit heavy but built solid. Can't go wrong with a Britax. It's the only seat my grandkids use.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best car seats ever I am on my third one now! Best brand!
customer_reviews.author: HealthAndLooks

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank. Install was relatively straightforward, though did take more effort than a standard booster seat install. This seat is VERY heavy. If you are planning on transporting it between multiple cars, understand it is large and heave.
customer_reviews.author: uafgrad

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat
customer_reviews.text: I had already bought this for my older, I think it’s the best car seat in the market. I love how easy it is to install and my kids sleep wonderfully in it (super comfy). Plus the safety features it has makes it perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: You can never be too safe!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. Very safe, the steel frame is a must! Very nice quality materials and cleans up easily!
customer_reviews.author: AndreaWH

customer_reviews.title: Easiest installation EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Even bought it twice for our other car. Super easy to install correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great design and very sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Great design and very sturdy construction. It's very heavy and a huge pain to carry and travel with but safety comes first. With as much as I drive in heavy LA traffic I needed something that offers superior side impact protection and this seat is definitely it!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have had this seat for at least 2 years and we still love it. It is so easy to install and installs extremely tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek, comfortable cushioning & g ool
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this carseat. Money well spent...super nice to feel my 6 year old 48 inches and 50 lbs growing fast...so she'll be in harness for another 10 inches. Love
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great car seats. i have a 6 and 7 year old and they love them. really secure
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to take in and out. Comfortable for the kiddos. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: The best car seat
customer_reviews.text: The best car seat. We needed one for grandma's car gor our 40# 5 yr old. Our favorite brand of car seat. Years of wear on our previous two.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: This is much heavier than a convertible car seat
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and good quality. Easy to install and cup holders are convenient
customer_reviews.author: LeaG

customer_reviews.title: Buckles are difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The seat looks likes and is comfortable, but the harness buckles are twist and are too difficult for my preschooler to buckle, especially in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ruddy

customer_reviews.title: Best carseat
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat and my son loves the cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. A little hard to tighten straps and to find the strap release
customer_reviews.author: B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great security
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The chair it’s big (too big). You have to consider it if your car is kind of small, because it tooks 2 of yours back seats.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and great for tall kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great for tall kids! Easy to use and secure in vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Great Car seat, easy to install and remove. Comfortable for long travels and easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lanzman

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! Very heavy and bulky though. Difficult to transfer in and out of vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice designe, easy to install and easy for a kid to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Soledad

customer_reviews.title: Thought there would be more padding.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great seat, I just wish there was a little more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Felisha

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat. After doing a lot of research on varies brands, sizes, and reviews this model always came up as the best. It is sturdy and safe. I liked this model better since it offered two cup holders and the seat was a tab bit wider than others. It will def grow with my son and will not need to purchase another seat after this purchase. We also bought another one for my mother's car and she loves it as well. I would highly recommend this product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat! Our son loves it and love knowing the safety that Britax provides.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I Highly recommend all Britax car seats. We own 4 clicktight car seats (2 convertible and 2 harness to booster) and will never purchase anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't so difficult to tighten if give out a 5 star This doesn't take up add much room in the car as our Racarro seat and I love that it has cup holders and little space floor snacks, great safety rating and reputable company The harness is difficult to tighten on this, we've bought two and they're both tough only down side of these
customer_reviews.author: MMKG42

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these. These can be taken in and out of the car very easily using either restraint system. Great quality. Love the adjustability and the arm rests and cup holders are great. The recline feature is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: VerifiedReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best seat on the market!
customer_reviews.text: We only buy Britax for our kids, the main reason is safety and the other reason, it is made in the USA. Our daughter loves her new seat. She is a small almost 7 year old who is 43 pounds. I told her she might be using this until she is 15.. then she might reach the height and weight limit. Thank you for such a wonderful, sturdy, safe seat! We will be back in a few months for another one, for another car.
customer_reviews.author: CCNRCC

product_meta.title: Britax Pinnacle ClickTight G1.1 Harness-2-Booster Car Seat - 3 Layer Impact Protection - 25 to 120 pounds, Mosaic
product_meta.description: Safety, comfort and convenience make the Pinnacle ClickTight an exceptional Harness 2 Booster Seat. Car seat installation is easy as buckling a seatbelt thanks to the ClickTight Installation System. In the Pinnacle Harness 2 Booster Car Seat you are surrounded in safety. This booster seat features the patented Britax SafeCell Impact Protection system which includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash. Britax designed the Pinnacle ClickTight Seat with three strong layers of side energy absorption; a deep foam lined shell, head protection, and external cushions will shield your child from the most severe type of collision. Two integrated cup holders keep drinks and snacks within reach and are easy to clean between rides. The 9 position quick adjust harness grows along with your child and it's easy to transition from a harness to a belt positioning booster by tucking the buckles and straps within the seat. The Pinnacle ClickTight Harness 2 Booster Seat can be used in Harness Mode for children 2 years old and 25 to 90 lbs. or in Booster Mode for children 40 to 120 lbs. Child standing height using the harness 30 58” and using booster mode 45 62”. Dimensions minimum 22.5 W x 28 H x 21 D, maximum 22.5 W x 36 H x 21 D inches. Seat width 12”. 9 Position harness slot heights 12.5” to 20.5”. May not be compatible with all vehicles, see user guide.
feature_bullets: Toddler to Big Kid: Easily transition from harness to belt positioning booster as your child grows
Easy installation: Patented ClickTight makes car seat installation as simple as buckling a seat belt
No rethreading, ever: Quick adjust 9 position harness with headrest for a comfortable, secure fit
Surrounded in safety: 3 layers of side impact protection, steel frame, impact absorbing base, and forward movement reducing v shaped tether
Fits: Forward facing harness mode 25 to 90 pounds, Booster mode 40 to 120 pounds; Maximum Dimensions: 22.5 W x 36 H x 21 D inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars168 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
